description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for rendering a game board for the 2048 puzzle game. It includes UI components such as a grid background, animated tiles, and handling for tile appearance, movement, and merging animations. The widget integrates with state management via Provider and is tailored for a square, animated, and responsive game interface.

classes.name: BoardView
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders the 2048 game board with animated tiles, background grid, and responsive layout using Flutter. It fetches game state via Provider and manages the display of tiles with animations for movement and merging.

classes.name: _GridBackground
classes.description: A widget responsible for rendering the static grid background of the game board, with cells styled to match the theme.

classes.name: _TilesLayer
classes.description: A widget that positions and manages animated tiles within the game board, ordering them for proper layering during animations.

classes.name: _AnimatedTile
classes.description: A stateful widget that manages spawn and merge animations for individual tiles, including scale and opacity effects.

classes.name: _TileView
classes.description: A widget rendering the visual style of a single tile, including color and text, based on the tile's value.

classes.name: _TileColors
classes.description: A utility class providing color schemes for tiles depending on their numerical value to match the Ocean theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for BoardView, including layout, background, tiles, and animations.

methods.name: _extractTiles
methods.description: Extracts a list of active tiles from the game board, sorted by their ID for stable rendering.

methods.name: _playSpawn
methods.description: Triggers spawn animation for newly created tiles.

methods.name: _scheduleMergePop
methods.description: Triggers a quick bounce animation for tiles that merge, to emphasize the merge effect.
